snippet: Health insurance tax credits, mandates, taxation of employer coverage, essential benefits. Mind-numbing health care jargon is flying around again as Republicans move to repeal and replace the Obama-era Affordable Care Act. It's time to start payin...

headline.main: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case
headline.print_headline: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case

lead_paragraph: Health insurance tax credits, mandates, taxation of employer coverage, essential benefits. Mind-numbing health care jargon is flying around again as Republicans move to repeal and replace the Obama-era Affordable Care Act. It's time to start paying attention.
